examples:
QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs > 20 then xs else case inventorPatent x patents of Just patent -> (lastnam x, firstnam x, patentId(patent)):xs; Nothing -> xs)
FROM inventors
TO relational
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> if (patentId x == 3858241 || patentId x == 3398406 || patentId x == 3557384 || patentId x == 3634889) then Vertex((patentId x, patentCountry x)) else Algebra.Graph.empty)
FROM patentGraph
TO graph
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> case gyear x of Just year -> if year < 1964 then Vertex((patentId x, patentCountry x)) else Algebra.Graph.empty; Nothing ->Vertex((patentId x, patentCountry x)))
FROM patentGraph
TO graph
RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x -> if patentId x == 3858249 then [x] else [])
FROM patentGraph
TO relational
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x -> if reachable x (t !! 0) patentGraph then Vertex x else Algebra.Graph.empty)
FROM patentGraph
TO graph
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> if reachable x (patents !? 3858249) patentGraph then Vertex x else Algebra.Graph.empty)
FROM patentGraph
TO graph
RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x -> if patentId x ==  3859982 then Vertex x else Algebra.Graph.empty)
FROM patentGraph
TO graph
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x -> findTargetNeighbors x patentGraph)
FROM t
TO graph
RETURN all

QUERY (\x xs -> if lastnam x == "Williams" then Overlay (Vertex (inventorPatent x patents))  xs else xs)
FROM inventors
TO graph
RETURN all
